short_title: National Geospatial Innovation Hub Advancement Act of 2024

summary.text:
National Geospatial Innovation Hub Advancement Act of 2024

This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to carry out a pilot program to assess the feasibility and advisability of establishing a program to develop a skilled workforce in geospatial technologies, methodologies, and capabilities to support DODâ€™s defense intelligence requirements. The requirement to carry out the pilot program terminates on September 30, 2030.
